title: Created
description: A new resource has been created.

title: No Content
description: The server successfully processed the request but returns no content.
action: Ensure idempotent clients handle empty responses.

title: Moved Permanently
description: The resource has a new permanent URI.
action: Update clients to use the new location.

title: Found
action: Use 307 for non-GET methods to preserve semantics.

title: Not Modified
description: The resource has not been modified since the last request.
action: Serve cached version to the client.

title: Bad Request
description: The request could not be understood due to malformed syntax.

title: Unauthorized
description: Authentication is required or has failed.

title: Forbidden
description: The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it.

title: Not Found
description: The server has not found anything matching the URI.
action: Check the endpoint and resource identifiers.

title: Conflict
description: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

title: Unprocessable Entity
description: The server understands the content type but was unable to process contained instructions.

title: Too Many Requests
description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

title: Bad Gateway
description: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

title: Service Unavailable
description: The server is currently unable to handle the request.
